error.title: Error
error.doExport: [ if you want to report a problem, please include exported file ]

messages.invalidPostData: The request has no setup data. See POST data:
messages.postDataSyntaxErr: The visualisation setup is not parse-able.
messages.bgReferenceMissing: JSON parametrization of the visualiser requires valid dataReference for each background layer.
messages.shaderTypeMissing: You must specify type parameter for each visualisation layer.
messages.pluginRemoved:
This plugin has been automatically
removed: there was an error.
messages.pluginRemovedNamed: Plugin {{plugin}} has been removed: there was an error.
messages.pluginLoadFailedNamed: Plugin {{plugin}} could not be loaded: please, contact administrator.
messages.visualisationDisabled: Failed to load overlays (Visualization {{name}}) - it has been disabled.
messages.overlaysLoadFail: Failed to load overlays - only the tissue will be visible.
messages.pluginsWelcome: It looks like this is your first time here
messages.pluginsWelcomeDescription: Please, go through {{tutorial}} tutorial to familiarize yourself with the environment.
